question: You have recently visited a city on vacation and stayed in a hotel.Write a letter to the manager about your stay. In your letter:Give details of your stayWhat were the high & low points of the hotelWhat are your suggestions; recommendations and / or complaints about hotel
text: I am writing in regard to  provide my recent visit to your hotel from 15th -25th July 2022. I appreciate the services provided by your resort ,Meanwhile I would like to  draw your attention to some areas that require improvement.

To begin with, Our family enjoyed our vacation in your motel very much. The food is awesome, especially the butter chicken masala is mouth-watering. The rooms were spacious and hygienic and the pleasant ambience,but the pool area was found to be unclean, with lots of fungus patches at the corners of the pool. Lastly, the room service staff isn't prompt and unresponsive over the phone.
In the line, I would request you take necessary action to mitigate above mention issue.Moreover, I suggest you please include the kid's play area also, as they feel entertained.
hoping these services are improved and maintained when we again visit  your resort.
